name: Coalescence (Miggli | Miklas)
description:
In this game your goal is to defeat the Evil Wizard while dodging difficult Bullet-Hell Patterns.

Utilize jumping and dashing in the Third-Person perspective.

Then strike back and attack the Wizard in the Top-Down perspective.

Normal mode is meant for players who are new to the Bullet-Hell genre.

Can you take down the Evil Wizard in Hard Mode?

Credits:

Game by Roman Bornschier & Miklas Neely

music by: http://abstractionmusic.com/

Songs used in-game:

Ludum Dare 28 - Track 3

Ludum Dare 28 - Track 4

Ludum Dare 32 - Track 5
